abstract: The Merano Wine festival celebrates its 20th anniversary, Nov. 4 to 7, in partnership with the Gourmet Club of South Tyrol.
snippet: The Merano Wine festival celebrates its 20th anniversary, Nov. 4 to 7, in partnership with the Gourmet Club of South Tyrol.
lead_paragraph: Italy has much to entice the intrepid oenophile. Tuscany and the Piedmont tend to rule the roost when it comes to wine, but it is the German- and Italian-speaking region of Alto Adige that hosts one of Europe's most prestigious wine events: the Merano Wine Festival, which celebrates its 20th anniversary this year, Nov. 4 to 7.
